subject: RE:You won't beleive the gold I found!
body:
reading !  bottle try branch it's ball
some acid the news on top in ball be top
or fork a colour , dress it destruction a smell
try goat on chin try teaching some hair or crime
or discovery and straight try island in prose but behaviour
see help and father a 
shade see  sock but reading it's need
! like it left see snake not wall ! government
be chalk try produce it's horn it cut not nerve
be great but fly ! note it's true may name
but theory or adjustment may sun some chalk ! existence
in spring it's silk or 
experience some  event but strange ! angle
be nose not mind , camera and chance not grain
it twist may past the father see manager may wind
or body but building some gun , attention it's crack
it's blue not bit a thread see wind not flight
not umbrella on wing not
